ThingDef.label: Advanced Temperature Control Augment (T.C.A.)
ThingDef.description: An advanced Temperature Control Augment (or just T.C.A.). This augment uses cooling and heating systems to regulate and keep the wearer within temperature ranges where the egg-whites won’t start decaying. This is the advanced version of it and is generally more reliable with regulating temperatures, but it isn’t powerful enough to deal with extremes.
